member.name: P:GoodAI.ToyWorld.Control.GameSetup.TilesetFile
member.summary:
Csv table containing columns "NameOfTile", "PositionInTileset" and "IsDefault" One TileName can have more PositionInTileset numbers, so object can behave based on common implementation but looks different according to position.
(string) Name of tile must match name of implemented object.
(int) Position in tileset is index of tile in png file with pictures of tiles and objects. It should match index in Tiled
(0|1) . If is some tile default, when new tile is created, this TileNumber will be used.
